start.thisjohn: This is John. You are John
start.playfsm:
Do you wish to play the FULL STORY MODE?
(type yes or no)

prestory.choicebanana: Good pick! What a healthy way to start!
prestory.choicecookie: Decent! But wow, one cookie for $1.50?
prestory.choicebread: Oh? You also like bread? I guess it can't be just me.
prestory.choicenone: Sorry, we don't have that here..

fullstory.havemoney: Anyways, you now have ${money:.2f}. Be sure to save it for later too :
fullstory.actualsecret: Your amount of health actually depends on what you eat.
fullstory.havehealth: So your health is currently {health_points}/20 HP
fullstory.whyhealth: But sir, why do I need those health points for?
fullstory.maingoal: And your main goal is to defeat BOB!!!
fullstory.iffail: If you fail to defeat him, the world will have the same fate as you'll have..
fullstory.sincewhen: Since when has my stepbrother been like this?
fullstory.nochoice: I guess I have no choice then.

mainfight.johnatk: You attacked BOB!! His HP dropped by
mainfight.bobatk: BOB attacked you back!! Your HP dropped by
mainfight.boughtarmor: You bought a piece of armor!
mainfight.nomoney: You don't have enough money left.
mainfight.johnweaker: But you became weaker after his hit..
mainfight.johnstrengthminus: Your strength points has gone down by
mainfight.nostrength: You don't have enough strength left.

ending.thankyou: <THANK YOU SO MUCH FOR PLAYING MY GAME, {username}!>
